entry.title: About me
entry.content:
NLP Engineer/AI Engineer/Drone Engineer/Aeroplane Engineer/Music lover/Movie lover

Welcome to visit my blog. Now I work as an engineer in the artificial intelligence filed. I want to engage myself in this field and set up my own career. I believe AI is the future.
